title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with different types of content, the content type does not have any effect on the displayed text.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a database field with three types of content:  a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.  b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags. c) Text with RTF tags. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field. Check if the displayed text is rendered according to the specified content type.
